name: lecture
description: - Describe the Representational State Transfer (REST) architecture. - Summarize the six guiding principles of REST. - Explain how REST is used to build Application Programming Interfaces (APIs). - Differentiate between REST, HTTP, and CRUD. - Identify which HTTP methods correspond to specific CRUD actions. - Summarize the advantages and disadvantages of the REST architecture. - Create a working RESTful API using Express. - Create structured data for the API. - Create and organize API routes. - Create custom middleware. - Use third-party middleware. - Summarize popular Express database integrations
